mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into medical(id,per_id,inspection_date,type_id,hospital,content,attending_surgeon) values(#{id},#{perId},#{inspectionDate},#{typeId},#{hospital},#{content},#{attendingSurgeon})
mapper.select: select id id ,per_id perId ,inspection_date inspectionDate ,type_id typeId,hospital hospital, content content,attending_surgeon attendingSurgeon from medical where id = #{id}

select.if: select medical.id,personal_information.name personalInformationName,medical.inspection_date inspectionDate,type.name typeName, medical.hospital,medical.content,medical.attending_surgeon attendingSurgeon from medical JOIN type on medical.type_id=type.id JOIN personal_information on medical.per_id=personal_information.id limit #{skipNum},#{takeNum}

mapper.select: select medical.id,personal_information.name personalInformationName,medical.inspection_date inspectionDate,type.name typeName, medical.hospital,medical.content,medical.attending_surgeon attendingSurgeon from medical JOIN type on medical.type_id=type.id JOIN personal_information on medical.per_id=personal_information.id where medical.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT m.id,m.per_id perId ,m.inspection_date inspectionDate,m.hospital,t.`name`, m.content,m.attending_surgeon attendingSurgeon FROM personal_information p JOIN medical m ON p.id=m.per_id JOIN type t ON t.id=m.type_id WHERE m.per_id=#{pId} ORDER BY inspection_date LIMIT #{begin1},#{limitPage1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM personal_information p JOIN medical m ON p.id=m.per_id JOIN type t ON t.id=m.type_id AND m.per_id=#{pId}

SELECT m.id,m.per_id perId,m.type_id typeId,m.inspection_date inspectionDate,m.hospital,t.`name`, m.content,m.attending_surgeon attendingSurgeon FROM personal_information p JOIN medical m ON p.id=m.per_id JOIN type t ON t.id=m.type_id AND m.id=#{id}
